title: Angular, unusual Italic from U of Michigan
author: hrant

comments.content: Looks like Gareth Hague’s [Jude](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710223040/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/alias/jude_bold_italic_ot/ot_ps?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=36&sample_text=Art%20%26%20Design%20Michigan&ft=liga) to me.
